entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Indin River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
